title: Winners of the 39th Golden Disc Awards in Fukuoka — in pictures
content: Crush was recognized for his song "Love you with all my heart" (2024), which featured on the hit tvN romance drama "Queen of Tears" (2024) starring actors Kim Soo-hyun and Kim Ji-won.

title: From worst to best in Asia 2024
content: The romantic drama “Queen of Tears” starring Kim Soo-hyun and Kim Ji-won was a 2024 global sensation, clocking more than 690 million viewing hours on Netflix.
